title: Druid
content: lemental Lv 4 Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Conjure a minor elemental to fight alongside you.18m Conjure Woodland Being Lv 4 Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Conjure a dryad to light alongside you. She can use Nature's Step. Entangle enemies. and Summon a wood woad.Until Long Rest 18m Freedom of Movement Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Snap an ally out of any Stun. Difficult Terrain can't slow them down and they can't be magically Paralysed or Restrained. Grasping Vine Lv 4 C
